about_the_game:
The Neon Raver Gang, LSD, has taken control of Smugtopia, turning the majority of the population into mindless ravers. Style your way with diving bullet time mechanics, super fast sliding, rocket jumping and much more discoverable tech! Trespass onto enemy territory with complete complacency including underground raves, abandoned skyscrapers, and more! Take back Smugtopia from the Neon Raver Gang known as LSD smugfully.

Insanely Smug Techniques:


Dive into death-defying bullet time and Slide into the DM's at high speed dispatching enemies like a human bowling ball with physics focused gameplay.

Super Score Rush


Challenge fellow Smugglers in a race against time and style with the Speedrun Mode. Full integration with Steam Leaderboard lets you pit yourself with Friends and the World

Be your own hero

With VRM support, recruit your own characters into the SmugForce.

Lethal Weaponry

Customizable guns with tweakable parameters make every tool viable.

Pro Gamer Options

  • Ultrawide, 16:9, 16:10, and 4:3 support
  • Gamepad + Steam Deck compatible
  • Remappable Key and Gamepad Bindings
  • Plethora of accessibility options
  • Video Options, FPS Cap, Quality Settings
  • Steam Cloud Cross Save for on-the-go Smugging

short_description: Slide and Dive through enemy bullets inside underground rave parties. Gun down the Neon Raver Gang, LSD, and save Smugtopia in this physics based third-person movement shooter.
